section.title: How to run installer?
section.para: If you have already gotten installer and packages, you can start installation process. Simply run computer from CD or floppy. I am describing here installation wizard, which is suitable for most users.

section.title: Intro
section.para: There are several things you have to know before you start installation:

listitem.para: You can scroll text using up and down arrow. Use the [Tab] key to move between widgets.

A shell is available on 2nd through 5th console. Installation log is kept in /var/log/installer. You might view it with viif some messages scrolled up the screen. You can also have a look at 6th console (logs are there).

section.title: Let us start
section.para: Soon afterwards booting up machine, you should see the bottom image:
If you do not need extra option, hit [Enter] key and allow loading linux kernel.
In this guide we use English version. In next screen you get installer possibilities summary:
Simply hit [Enter] key again, and you go to main installer menu:
